column4: I was here earlier with the same kind of problem, and the solution I was given doesn't work for this. I moved a file into my home directory, and it isn't owned by my user, how do I make it so that all files and folders in my home directory don't have to be executed with sudo?
Sorry iceroot, I left IRC open on another computer using `marcus :/
I want to be able to do everything to it with this user and not have to use sudo
